TEXT.TITLE: VERITY CALLS FOR NEW ADHERENCE TO VENICE PACT
TEXT.BODY: Commerce Secretary C. William Verity called for stepped up coordination of the major industrialized nations along the lines of the Venice pact last June which committed the nations to coordinate economic policies. Verity, speaking to a trade conference of the Overseas Private Investment Corp., said "We must improve coodination with our major industrialized allies and trading partners along the lines agreed to at the Venice meeting last June. He added "we need better cooperation among advanced developing countries in assuring responsibility to coordinate local economies commensurate with their economic resources. reuter
